basics.name: Steven Simon
basics.label: Marketing Developer at Wiley
basics.summary:
I am a designer and technologist that strives to create beautiful and delightful experiences across a variety of media and platforms. My experience includes designing and developing web, digital, and physical technologies that trigger emotion through an invitation to interact. My skills include:

Interaction Design, UX Research, UI Design, Wireframing, Visual Communication Design, Responsive Web Design, Motion Design, Visual Design, Physical Computing, Rapid Prototyping, Frontend Development, Scripting

User Research: 
A/B Testing, Affinity Diagramming, Heuristic Evaluation, Personas, Storyboarding, Site mapping, User Journey Mapping, Usability Testing, Wireframing, Competitive Analysis

Design:
XD, Figma, Sketch, InVision, Miro, Photoshop, Illustrator, Indesign, After Effects, Animate, Audition, Premiere, Fuse, Maya, Blender, Unity, Audacity, GIMP, Inkscape, Google Docs, Google Slides, Google Sheets

Coding:
HTML5, CSS3, SASS, JavaScript, jQuery, p5.js, Web Sockets, Node.js, Express.js, Vue, React, Gatsby, Three.js, Backbone.js, Adapt eLearning, Apache Cordova, Foundation, Bootstrap, WordPress, PHP, Sitecore, Umbraco, C, C++, OpenGL, Python, Git, Visual Studio, and Arduino
